mapper.sql:
a.id, a.alias, a.agent_id, a.geway_code_id, a.channel_id, a.binding_type, a.service_charge_type, a.service_charge, a.extra_service_charge, a.is_enable, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.ts_time, a.yn, ifnull(b.agent_name, '') as agent_name,
b.agent_type, c.geway_code_name, ifnull(d.channel_name, '') as channel_name,
ifnull(e.geway_name, '') as geway_name, ifnull(f.code_name, '') as code_name
mapper.select: select count(1) from tb_pr_agent_profit_distribution a left join tb_pr_agent b on a.agent_id = b.id left join tb_pr_geway_code c on a.geway_code_id = c.id left join tb_pr_channel d on a.channel_id = d.id left join tb_pr_geway e on c.geway_id = e.id left join tb_pr_platform_geway_code f on a.pf_geway_code_id = f.id

select
from tb_pr_agent_profit_distribution a left join tb_pr_agent b on a.agent_id = b.id left join tb_pr_geway_code c on a.geway_code_id = c.id left join tb_pr_channel d on a.channel_id = d.id left join tb_pr_geway e on c.geway_id = e.id left join tb_pr_platform_geway_code f on a.pf_geway_code_id = f.id
order by a.create_time desc

select
from tb_pr_agent_profit_distribution a left join tb_pr_agent b on a.agent_id = b.id left join tb_pr_geway_code c on a.geway_code_id = c.id left join tb_pr_channel d on a.channel_id = d.id left join tb_pr_geway e on c.geway_id = e.id left join tb_pr_platform_geway_code f on a.pf_geway_code_id = f.id

select
from tb_pr_agent_profit_distribution a left join tb_pr_agent b on a.agent_id = b.id left join tb_pr_geway_code c on a.geway_code_id = c.id left join tb_pr_channel d on a.channel_id = d.id left join tb_pr_geway e on c.geway_id = e.id left join tb_pr_platform_geway_code f on a.pf_geway_code_id = f.id
limit 1
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as id
insert into tb_pr_agent_profit_distribution
alias,
agent_id,
deploy_id,
geway_code_id,
channel_id,
binding_type,
service_charge_type,
service_charge,
extra_service_charge,
is_enable,
create_time,
values
#{alias},
#{agentId},
#{deployId},
#{gewayCodeId},
#{channelId},
#{bindingType},
#{serviceChargeType},
#{serviceCharge},
#{extraServiceCharge},
#{isEnable},
NOW(),
mapper.update:
UPDATE tb_pr_agent_profit_distribution a
a.alias = #{alias},
a.deploy_id = #{deployId},
a.agent_id = #{agentId},
a.geway_code_id = #{gewayCodeId},
a.channel_id = #{channelId},
a.binding_type = #{bindingType},
a.service_charge_type = #{serviceChargeType},
a.service_charge = #{serviceCharge},
a.extra_service_charge = #{extraServiceCharge},
a.is_enable = #{isEnable},
a.update_time = NOW(),
where 1=1 and a.id = #{id} and a.yn = 0

update tb_pr_agent_profit_distribution a
a.is_enable=#{isEnable},
a.yn = #{yn},
a.update_time=NOW()
where 1=1 and a.id = #{id} and a.yn = 0
UPDATE tb_pr_agent_profit_distribution a set a.yn = 1, a.update_time = now() where 1=1 and a.id =#{id} and a.yn=0
UPDATE tb_pr_agent_profit_distribution a set a.yn = 1, a.update_time = now() where 1=1 and a.deploy_id =#{id} and a.yn=0
